siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: An app to help you plan your real-world and digital social events. By combining event creation, calendars, group chats and information sharing, Herdd puts everything in one place making planning your social events seamless and stress-free.
blogPost.body: An app to help you plan your real-world and digital social events. By combining event creation, calendars, group chats and information sharing, Herdd puts everything in one place making planning your social events seamless and stress-free.
blogPost.title: Herdd - An app to help plan your social events.
blogPost.author: Max Carter

localize.description: 一款帮助您计划现实世界和数字社交活动的应用程序。通过将活动创建、日历、群聊和信息共享结合在一起，Herdd将所有内容放在一个地方，使您可以无缝、无压力地计划您的社交活动。
localize.tagline: 一款帮助您计划社交活动的应用程序。

localize.description: 一款幫助您計劃現實世界和數字社交活動的應用程序。通過將活動創建、日曆、羣聊和信息共享結合在一起，Herdd將所有內容放在一個地方，使您可以無縫、無壓力地計劃您的社交活動。
localize.tagline: 一款幫助您計劃社交活動的應用程序。

previous.excerpt: Project Lightspeed is a self contained live streaming server. With Lightspeed you will be able to deploy your own sub-second latency streaming site. The Lightspeed repository contains the instructions for installing and deploying the entire application.
previous.title: Project Lightspeed - a sub-second, open source, self hosted stream from OBS

localize.description: Project LightSpeed是一个独立的直播服务器。使用LightSpeed，您将能够部署自己的亚秒级延迟流媒体站点。LightSpeed存储库包含安装和部署整个应用程序的说明。
localize.tagline: 来自OBS的次秒级开源自托管流

localize.description: Project LightSpeed是一個獨立的直播服務器。使用LightSpeed，您將能夠部署自己的亞秒級延遲流媒體站點。LightSpeed存儲庫包含安裝和部署整個應用程序的說明。
localize.tagline: 來自OBS的次秒級開源自託管流

next.excerpt: This is an installable PWA countdown to Biden inauguration. In case you can't wait for it. You can always check how many seconds are left. It will be updated once the impeachment proceeedings start.
next.title: Orange Countdown - A countdown for when Trump leaves office

localize.description: 这是拜登就职典礼的可安装PWA倒计时。以防你等不及了。您可以随时查看还剩多少秒。一旦弹劾程序开始，它将被更新。
這是拜登就職典禮的可安裝PWA倒計時。以防你等不及了。您可以隨時查看還剩多少秒。一旦彈劾程序開始，它將被更新。
